src_text: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

src_text: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyngyi Dani of Hungary.
ref_text: Wa shahida sibaquha al-2a5ar, sibaq Giant Slalom, e7tilalaha al-markaz al-3asher fi majmu3at al-sayidat ma3a waqt ijmali qadruhu 4:41.30, abta2 men sa7ibat al-markaz al-awal bi 2:11.60 daqiqa, al-Namsawiya Klaudia Loesch wa bi 1:09.02 daqiqa min sa7ibat al markaz al-tase3 Gyngyi Dani min al-Majar.
hyp_text: Wa 2al juz2 al 2akhar, al-Race al-Giant Slalom, ra7at an takun fi al 10 fi juz2 al mara al istiqiyya bi mawqif 4:41.30 min fi al 2awda al mujamma3a, 2:11.60 daqiqat 2ashar min al mara al awwala Claudia Loesch al 2almaniyya wa 1:09.02 daqiqat 2ashar min al mara al 9 Gyngyi Dani al magyariyya.

prompt:

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Wa 3ala mar al qurun, bana annas tarrasat bi 3inaya 3ala al manadhir attabi3iyya al wa3ira wa shadidat al in7idar wusulan ila al mun7adarat al mutilla 3ala al ba7er.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Tamma ighla8 800 mil min nizam khat anabib Trans-Alaska ba3da tasarub alaf al-baramil min annift al-kham janob Firbanks, Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Kanat 2al manateq 2al 7aleyya min Baljeka juz2an min Luxembourg fil madi wa lakennaha 2asba7at Baljeka ba3d 2al thawra 2al Baljekeyya fi thalatheneyyat 2al qarn 2al tase3 3ashar.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Asba7a mawqe3 The Onion imbraturiyyat akhbar mu7akat sakhira 7aqiqiyya, ma3a isdarin matbu3 wa mawqa3in iliktroniy jadhaba akthar min 5 malayin za2ir fi shahr Oktober/tishrin al-thani, wa i3lanat khassa, wa shabaka ikhbariyya 3ala madar 24 sa3a, wa mudawinat sawtiyya, wa atlas 3alamiy tamma itlaquhu mu2akharan wa yusamma Our Dumb World "3alamuna al-ghabiy".

hyp_text: Machu Picchu tata3allamun bi 3athar 3ashar 3ala 3athar thalath, al-Intihuatana, al-masjid al-shamsi, wa al-ghurfa al-thalathat al-nafar.

[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Wa ma3a dhalika, fa enna jami3 al-Baljikiyyin wal Swisriyyin al-natiqin bil Faransiyya sa-yata3allamun al-Fransiyya al-qiyasiyya fil madaris, lidha sa-yakunun qadirin 3ala fehmika 7atta en stakhdamata nidham attarqim al-Faransy al-qiyasi.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Wa 3ala mar al qurun, bana annas tarrasat bi 3inaya 3ala al manadhir attabi3iyya al wa3ira wa shadidat al in7idar wusulan ila al mun7adarat al mutilla 3ala al ba7er.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Tamma ighla8 800 mil min nizam khat anabib Trans-Alaska ba3da tasarub alaf al-baramil min annift al-kham janob Firbanks, Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Kanat 2al manateq 2al 7aleyya min Baljeka juz2an min Luxembourg fil madi wa lakennaha 2asba7at Baljeka ba3d 2al thawra 2al Baljekeyya fi thalatheneyyat 2al qarn 2al tase3 3ashar.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Asba7a mawqe3 The Onion imbraturiyyat akhbar mu7akat sakhira 7aqiqiyya, ma3a isdarin matbu3 wa mawqa3in iliktroniy jadhaba akthar min 5 malayin za2ir fi shahr Oktober/tishrin al-thani, wa i3lanat khassa, wa shabaka ikhbariyya 3ala madar 24 sa3a, wa mudawinat sawtiyya, wa atlas 3alamiy tamma itlaquhu mu2akharan wa yusamma Our Dumb World "3alamuna al-ghabiy".

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Wa 3ala mar al qurun, bana annas tarrasat bi 3inaya 3ala al manadhir attabi3iyya al wa3ira wa shadidat al in7idar wusulan ila al mun7adarat al mutilla 3ala al ba7er.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Tamma ighla8 800 mil min nizam khat anabib Trans-Alaska ba3da tasarub alaf al-baramil min annift al-kham janob Firbanks, Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Wa ma3a dhalika, fa enna jami3 al-Baljikiyyin wal Swisriyyin al-natiqin bil Faransiyya sa-yata3allamun al-Fransiyya al-qiyasiyya fil madaris, lidha sa-yakunun qadirin 3ala fehmika 7atta en stakhdamata nidham attarqim al-Faransy al-qiyasi.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Wa 3ala mar al qurun, bana annas tarrasat bi 3inaya 3ala al manadhir attabi3iyya al wa3ira wa shadidat al in7idar wusulan ila al mun7adarat al mutilla 3ala al ba7er.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Tamma ighla8 800 mil min nizam khat anabib Trans-Alaska ba3da tasarub alaf al-baramil min annift al-kham janob Firbanks, Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Kanat 2al manateq 2al 7aleyya min Baljeka juz2an min Luxembourg fil madi wa lakennaha 2asba7at Baljeka ba3d 2al thawra 2al Baljekeyya fi thalatheneyyat 2al qarn 2al tase3 3ashar.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Modern Standard Arabic (Romanized)]: Asba7a mawqe3 The Onion imbraturiyyat akhbar mu7akat sakhira 7aqiqiyya, ma3a isdarin matbu3 wa mawqa3in iliktroniy jadhaba akthar min 5 malayin za2ir fi shahr Oktober/tishrin al-thani, wa i3lanat khassa, wa shabaka ikhbariyya 3ala madar 24 sa3a, wa mudawinat sawtiyya, wa atlas 3alamiy tamma itlaquhu mu2akharan wa yusamma Our Dumb World "3alamuna al-ghabiy".

src_text: While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province.
ref_text: Fi 7in 2anna madinat Goma 2amina bi-shaklin ma3qul, yajib al-ba7th 3an ayi ziyarat kharij Goma li fahm 7alat al-qital al-mustamir fi muqata3at shamal Kivu..

src_text: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.
ref_text: Bi nnisba lil 2usturaliyin, fa-2ina fikrat al-qahwa "al-bayda2 al-musatta7a" ghariba 3anhum. Al-qahwa sawda2 al-khafifa hiya "'espresso", ya2ti al-cappuccino mumtali2an bi-alcreama (wa laysa arraghwa) , wa ashay yuqaddam bidun 7alib.
hyp_text: 7anna al-3usbyyuna al-australyya li-tarik al-fikr bi 2al qahwa al-bayda al-musawa bi-3adat al-gharbiyya. Al-qahwa al-saqiyya al-sughra tasma3 3ala "espresso", wa al-kapuchino yatajama3 3ala al-qalam (wa la 3ala al-khamr), wa al-shay al-mutawassit yutawaffaq ila al-masakin bil laym.
